description:
Following Tatsumi’s capture, Night Raid successfully defeated Commander-in-Chief Budou but at the cost of Main and Susanoo’s lives.  The Revolutionary Army surrounds the capital as the civilians start to riot.  Wave is confounded by what he sees as Ran calmly observes how everything unfolds.  Meanwhile, Kurome senses that the end of her life is drawing near and seeks to settle things with her older sister once and for all.
Source: crunchyroll
